footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Flins | Update Date: 10/06/2025 | Editor: .m1zuneko

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Bloodsoaked Ruins__
BiS, has high Base ATK, provides CRIT Rate and Lunar-Charged DMG Bonus.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Staff of the Scarlet Sands__
Second best option for Flins, be careful not to build too much CRIT Rate using this weapon along with Night of the Sky’s Unveiling artifact set

__Staff of Homa__ __Primordial Jade Winged-Spear__
Powerful options if you do not have access to Flins' signature.

__Deathmatch__ __Ballad of the Fjords__
Deathmatch is Flins's best 4-star weapon, with Ballad of the Fjords being a little worse.

__Prospector's Shovel__
Flins's best craftable weapon.

__Missive Windspear__
An option for old players who have completed version 3.1 main event.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% or Elemental Mastery|<goblet> ATK% or Elemental Mastery|<circlet> CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Ancient Ritual: Cometh the Night
**2)** Elemental skill: Ancient Rite: Arcane Light

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Flins does not need to level up his Normal Attacks. 
Prioritize getting him to Lv.90 as it increases his Lunar-Charged DMG.
